{"id":490170677,"lang":"cpp","time":"11 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1620422294,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"28 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/490170677/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Delete Operation for Two Strings","memory":"12.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minDistance(string word1, string word2) {\n        int n = word1.length();\n        int m = word2.length();\n        vector<vector<int>> dp(n + 1, vector<int>(m + 1, 0));\n        for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) dp[i][0] = i;\n        for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) dp[0][i] = i;\n        for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {\n            for (int j = 1; j <= m; ++j) {\n                int add = 2 * (word1[i - 1] != word2[j - 1]);\n                dp[i][j] = min(dp[i - 1][j - 1] + add, 1 + min(dp[i - 1][j], dp[i][j - 1]));\n            }\n        }\n        return dp.back().back();\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"delete-operation-for-two-strings"}
